_metadata.description: Human-friendly issue triage, resolution tracking, and scan triggers

requirements.title: Mark issue as resolved
requirements.description: Allow marking issues as resolved with optional resolution notes
requirements.notes: Resolved issues hidden from default view but queryable

requirements.title: Mark issue as ignored
requirements.description: Allow marking issues as ignored with reason (e.g., false positive, intentional design)
requirements.notes: Ignored issues hidden from default view but queryable

requirements.title: Issue status filtering
requirements.description: Filter issues by status: open, resolved, ignored, all

requirements.title: Issue detail view
requirements.description: Display full agent notes, suggested remediation steps, and file context for selected issue

requirements.title: Issue de-duplication grouping
requirements.description: Group or link same logical issue from multiple sources (lint + type + AI)
requirements.notes: Match by file + line number + fuzzy message similarity

requirements.title: Trigger one-off light scan
requirements.description: UI button to trigger immediate light scan for a scenario
requirements.notes: Show scan progress and refresh results on completion

requirements.title: Trigger one-off smart scan
requirements.description: UI button to trigger immediate smart scan for a scenario or file subset
requirements.notes: Warn about AI cost; show batch progress

requirements.title: Enable/disable campaign from UI
requirements.description: Toggle to enable or disable auto-tidiness campaign for a scenario
requirements.notes: Show current campaign status and next scheduled session
